Title: Fix soft File Splitter
Description: Fix soft File Splitter is a free file splitter and merger.It can split a file into specified number of blocks or at specified unit size, so they can be easily attached to an email, or stored in a removable device.It can merge files,too.It developed by VB.Net and WPF.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Fix soft File Splitter is a free open source file splitter and merger.It can split a file into specified number of blocks or at specified unit size, so they can be easily attached to an email, or stored in a removable device such as USB drive, floppy disk, MP3, MP4, and mobile phone. It can also be used to merge files. It can merge split files in the same directory back into a new file identical to the original one. With advanced algorithms and clean and simple interface, Fix soft File Splitter can help you get done tasks quickly and accurately while ensuring easy and convenient operation. It’s a convenient tool that you will never want to miss.It developed by VB.Net and WPF.

It’s unique in design,speed,performance and tools.It uses new technologies of Windows Vista and Windows Seven.

Key Features:

- Unique Native Design

- Pause Support

- Aero Glass

- Open source and free

- Fast

- Professional Dialog Boxes (TaskDialog)

- Taskbar ProgressBar

- Split files by their size or number of parts

- Developed by WPF technology

- Safe algorithms ,your files will never be damaged

- Small size

- Easy to use
